column4: i am trying to install grub. i followed the instructions. i reboot my computer . at the beggining it stuck at the grub console. i couldnt install ubuntu and im tryg to get to windows because i need to rip another ubuntu cd. do anyone know how to solve this. and fdisk doesnt work at cmd of the vista cd
You need to boot the vista cd to the recovery console, then run 'Bootrec /fixboot'  followed  by 'Bootrec /fixmbr'
